item.title: Miramar Hotel Group offer now available with Asia Miles
item.description: Source: Miramar Hotel Taipei website. Miramar Hotel Group is now part of the Asia Miles rewards program. This means members can earn 250 Asia Miles for every qualifying stay at either the Miramar Garden Taipei or Miramar Hotel Hsinchu. To earn miles, members should provide their membership number during booking and show their card upon arrival. Note that this offer applies to deluxe room reservations. For reference, the Miramar Garden Taipei first opened its doors in 2006, followed by the Miramar Hotel Hsinchu in 2013.
